div.head: 死胎在腹
div.div: a dead fetus in the abdomen

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: a dead fetus in the abdomen

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zi si fu zhong 子死腹中 , a fetus’ death in the abdomen. Pu ji fang 普濟方 328, Recipe Entry chen xiang wan ying wan 沉香萬應丸 , pills with chen xiang that generate a myriad responses: 死胎在腹，不過二丸 , “For a dead fetus in the abdomen , not more than two pills”.
